answers.answer: Headaches and swelling are signs of high blood pressure and/or preeclampsia . You should definitely get checked if the swelling doesn't go down soon!
It doesn't look swelled up it just feels like it. . So I still go
If they feel swollen, numb or tingly I would still go. I think it's better safe than sorry when it comes to our little ones. How long have you been feeling this way?
Yes, please see your medical provider or call the on call doctor.  Pre - eclampsia can be dangerous for both you and baby.  How far along are you in your pregnancy?
Am 24 weeks on Monday I'll b 25

question: Am not feeling very good.. am having this headache that comes and goes.. I feel like my legs, feets , arms and hands swell up and feel like is tickling feeling while they feel swelled up.also It feels like a fever but its just my body thats warm not my head. I feel much better when am in the shower.. all I want to do is b in there ..  well I rather b in a bath tub but I don't have one.. does anybody know or has had this.. should I head to the hospital?
title: PLEASE HELP!
